soba_userInput: Complete the Middle baroque with all missing details

subConcepts.name: Bach
subConcepts.description: A significant composer of the Middle Baroque era.

subConcepts.name: Key Composers
subConcepts.description: Composers who significantly influenced the music of the Middle Baroque.

subConcepts.name: Ornamentation
subConcepts.description: The use of elaborate melodies and embellishments.

subConcepts.name: Basso Continuo
subConcepts.description: A form of continuous bass that underpins Baroque music.

subConcepts.name: Styles and Characteristics
subConcepts.description: Distinct features that defined the Middle Baroque style.
